applicant-name.name: ZHENGZHOU MAOYAN AGRICULTURAL TECH CO LTD
郑州猫眼农业科技有限公司

invention-title: Rare earth doped up-conversion red light emission Sc6WO12 fluorescent powder and preparation method thereof
一种稀土掺杂上转换红光发射的Sc6WO12荧光粉及其制备方法

abstract.p: The invention discloses a rare earth doped scandium tungstate up-conversion luminescent material and a preparation method thereof, and belongs to the technical field of luminescent materials. The structural formula of the up-conversion luminescent material provided by the invention is (Sc < 1-x-y > Yb < x > Er < y >) < 6 > WO < 12 >, x is equal to 0.05 to 0.4, and y is equal to 0.01 to 0.04; the preparation method is a high-temperature solid-phase method and comprises the following steps of: uniformly mixing scandium oxide, ytterbium oxide, erbium oxide and tungsten oxide serving as raw materials by using absolute ethyl alcohol, drying, pressing into sheets, and carrying out high-temperature solid-phase sintering in a hydrogen furnace at the temperature of between 1,200 and 1,350 DEG C; the prepared rare earth doped scandium tungstate up-conversion luminescent material has excellent luminescence performance, the relative intensity of luminescence can reach 3440.18 at most, the corresponding red light wavelength is 665 nm, and the regulation and control of the luminescence intensity can be realized by adjusting the proportion of the doped rare earth. Meanwhile, the preparation method has the advantages of being high in yield, simple in preparation process, high in repeatability and the like, the preparation process is more energy-saving and environment-friendly, and the preparation method is suitable for industrial popularization.

本发明公开了一种稀土掺杂钨酸钪上转换发光材料及其制备方法，属于发光材料技术领域；本发明涉及的上转换发光材料的结构式为(Sc1‑x‑yYbxEry)6WO12，其中x＝0.05～0.4，y＝0.01～0.04；制备方法为高温固相法：采用氧化钪、氧化镱、氧化铒和氧化钨作为原料，用无水乙醇将原料混合均匀并烘干，将其压制成片后在氢炉中1200℃‑1350℃高温固相烧结；本发明制备的稀土掺杂钨酸钪上转换发光材料具有优异的发光性能，其发光的相对强度最高可达3440.18，对应的红光波长为665nm，并且可通过调整所掺稀土的比例实现对发光强度的调控。同时本发明制备方法具有产率高、制备流程简单、重复度高等优点，且制备过程也更加节能环保，适合在工业上进行推广。
